tit.e: Fujiwara Shike (Four families of the Fujiwara clan)
Fujiwara Shike (Four families of the Fujiwara clan)

sen.j: 藤原四家（ふじわらしけ）は、藤原氏四家ともいい、藤原不比等の4人の息子が興した藤原氏の四つの家の総称。
sen.e: Fujiwara Shike, also called four families of the Fujiwara clan, means the four family lines founded by four sons of FUJIWARA no Fuhito.
Fujiwara Shike, also called four families of the Fujiwara clan, means the four family lines founded by four sons of FUJIWARA no Fuhito.
Fujiwara Shike, also called four families of the Fujiwara clan, means the four family lines founded by four sons of FUJIWARA no Fuhito.

sen.j: 藤原南家 - 藤原武智麻呂（むちまろ）680年 - 737年
sen.e: Fujiwara Nanke (the Southern House of the Fujiwara clan) was founded by FUJIWARA no Muchimaro (680-737).
Fujiwara Nanke (the Southern House of the Fujiwara clan): Founded by FUJIWARA no Muchimaro (680-737).
sen.cmt: ハイフン→コロン に変更しました。
sen.e: Fujiwara Nanke (the Southern House of the Fujiwara clan): Founded by FUJIWARA no Muchimaro (680-737).

sen.j: 藤原北家 - 藤原房前（ふささき）681年 - 737年
sen.e: Fujiwara Hokke (the Northern House of the Fujiwara clan) was founded by FUJIWARA no Fusasaki (681-737).
Fujiwara Hokke (the Northern House of the Fujiwara clan): Founded by FUJIWARA no Fusasaki (681-737).
sen.cmt: ハイフン→コロン に変更しました。
sen.e: Fujiwara Hokke (the Northern House of the Fujiwara clan): Founded by FUJIWARA no Fusasaki (681-737).

sen.j: 藤原式家 - 藤原宇合（うまかい）694年？ - 737年
sen.e: Fujiwara Shikike was founded by FUJIWARA no Umakai (694?-737).
Fujiwara Shikike: Founded by FUJIWARA no Umakai (ca. 694 - 737).
Fujiwara Shikike: Founded by FUJIWARA no Umakai (ca. 694 - 737).

sen.j: 藤原京家 - 藤原麻呂（まろ）695年 - 737年
sen.e: Fujiwara Kyoke (the Western House of the Fujiwara clan) was founded by FUJIWARA no Maro (695-737).
Fujiwara Kyoke (the Western House of the Fujiwara clan): Founded by FUJIWARA no Maro (695 - 737).
sen.cmt: ハイフン→コロン に変更しました。
sen.e: Fujiwara Kyoke (the Western House of the Fujiwara clan): Founded by FUJIWARA no Maro (695 - 737).

sen.j: 藤原は姓であり、家名でも苗字でもないため、明治以前においては「藤原家」なる家は公家には存在しない。
sen.e: FUJIWARA is a kabane, and not a family name nor a last name, and before the Meiji period, there is no Fujiwara-ke among court nobles.
Since FUJIWARA is a kabane (hereditary title), and not a family name nor a last name, there was no 'Fujiwara-ke' (Fujiwara family) among court nobles before the Meiji period.
sen.cmt: カバネ 補足を追加しました。
sen.e: Since FUJIWARA is a kabane (hereditary title), and not a family name nor a last name, there was no 'Fujiwara-ke' (Fujiwara family) among court nobles before the Meiji period.

sen.j: 藤原四家とは、藤原家ではなく、藤原氏の「南家」、藤原氏の「北家」、藤原氏の「式家」、藤原氏の「京家」の総称である。
sen.e: Fujiwara Shike does not mean Fujiwara family, but a wholesome name of four family lines:Nanke, Hokke, Shikike and Kyoke.
Fujiwara Shike does not mean Fujiwara family, but a wholesome name of four family lines: 'Nanke,' 'Hokke,' 'Shikike,' and 'Kyoke' of the Fujiwara clan.
sen.cmt: クォーテーションマークを追加しました。
sen.e: Fujiwara Shike does not mean Fujiwara family, but a wholesome name of four family lines: 'Nanke,' 'Hokke,' 'Shikike,' and 'Kyoke' of the Fujiwara clan.
